name: chamomile garden
description:
You show up at his door with a knife in your hand and a hollow in your chest… 

There’s a house in the woods where your wife lives.
You left in search of magic and returned broken and scared.
Is there hope left?
Yes, there is always hope. 

Chamomile Garden is a short game about being loved when the world gets overwhelming. Come home. Hang up your coat. Let the fate of the universe rest in someone else’s hands for a while. 

CW: this game contains brief mentions of trauma, including implied sexual assault.
